TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 87
TEI.2.document_title: Ramon Musquiz to Stephen F Austin, 08-03-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Ramon Musquiz to Austin, August 3, 1828. Notifying him of arrest of two men wanted in the United States, and instructing him to arrest the other two on the Trinity. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 87

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Ramon Musquiz to Austin, August 3, 1828. Notifying him of arrest of two men wanted in the United States, and instructing him to arrest the other two on the Trinity. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="08-03-1828">August 3, 1828*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
*/div1*
